module.name: Club
module.entry: INSERT INTO club (name, name_short, name_en, name_short_en, code, nationality, extern_id) VALUES (:name, :nameShort, :nameEn, :nameShortEn, :code, :nationality, :externId)
UPDATE club SET name = :name, name_short = :nameShort, name_en = :nameEn, name_short_en = :nameShortEn, code = :code, nationality = :nationality, extern_id = :externId WHERE club_id = :id
SELECT club_id, name, name_short, name_en, name_short_en, code, nationality, extern_id FROM club

module.name: ClubContent
module.entry: DELETE FROM club_content WHERE club_id = :club_id AND team_id = :team_id
SELECT team.team_id, team.name FROM club_content INNER JOIN team ON club_content.team_id = team.team_id WHERE club_id = :club_id
SELECT team.team_id, team.name FROM club_content INNER JOIN team ON club_content.team_id = team.team_id WHERE NOT club_id = :club_id

module.name: Team
module.entry: UPDATE team SET name = :name WHERE team_id = :id

module.name: SetFocus
module.entry: INSERT INTO set_focus (name, abbr, notes) VALUES (:name, :abbr, :notes)
UPDATE set_focus SET name = :name, abbr = :abbr, notes = :notes WHERE focus_id = :id
SELECT focus_id, name, abbr, notes FROM set_focus
